nucleoid.stop.scheduled: Server restart has been scheduled! The server will restart in %s minutes, or when all games exit.
nucleoid.stop.scheduled.already: Server restart has already been scheduled.
nucleoid.stop.game.open: Cannot join this game: a server stop has been scheduled!
nucleoid.error.in_game: You cannot run this command when you are in a game!
nucleoid.error.correct_game_mode: You are already in the correct game mode!
nucleoid.gamemode.fixed: Your game mode has been changed to adventure!
